body:
ruined by the UB and more than one dude. what a waste of talent and time.
 and fuckin goblins? chriiiiiiiiiiist.
I honestly found the ARC-V segment quite hot with all the fusion innuendos, I hate Sora a lot though. Would like to see some other manga where a similar type of analogy is used by a non-scumbag
BLACK GUY, SKULL KNIGHT, AND EVERYONE ELSE I WILL DESTROY YOU ALL!!!!
Fucking hot. Wish this guy did more YGO content.
I want to kill Sora even more now.....

Hahahaha when Sora's face appeared at the end of the Zexal bit, I couldn't stop laughing. Something about his expression and being butt naked while taking off a frog(?) mask and saying "Let the hunting game begin" really clicks strangely in my head.
